hero.title: We build websites and apps that bring customers
hero.desc: We combine strategic design, clean code and fast delivery. You get a turnkey product: from idea and prototype to launch and support.

services.desc1: UX/UI, frontend, backend, integrations and analytics — one team, one deadline.
services.desc2: First version in weeks, not months. We focus on business metrics, not extra screens.
services.desc3: Architecture ready to grow: Next.js + Strapi + modern infrastructure.

pricing.title: Choose your product approach
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing. Each plan includes 30 days of support after launch.

contact.title: Ready to grow? Tell us your idea.
contact.subtitle: We reply within 24 hours and send a launch plan with a budget.
contact.telegram: Or message us on Telegram right now
